changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Mise à jour de présentation de l'écran d: Updated presentation of the equipment configuration screen
changelog.md.Possibilité d'utiliser les services Jeed: Possibility of using Jeedom Cloud services for sending emails (in beta limited to 5 emails per day
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Correction de la perte de l'icône: Correction of the loss of the icon

index.md.Après avoir installé le plugin, il vous: After installing the plugin, you just need to activate it
index.md.Ce plugin n'a aucune configuration parti: This plugin has no particular configuration
index.md.La configuration des équipements Mail es: The configuration of Mail equipment is accessible from the plugin menu

index.md.nom de l'expéditeur du mail (ex: name of the sender of the email (ex
index.md.aucune configuration à faire, envoi des: no configuration to do, sending of emails by the Jeedom Cloud service, in beta phase for the moment, limited to 5 emails per day
index.md.mode le plus courant pour l'envoi de mai: most common method for sending emails
index.md.utilise la [fonction d'envoi standard de: use the [standard send function of PHP, window = "\_ blank
index.md.Hormis l'option SMTP, les autres options: Apart from the SMTP option, the other options require the configuration of the OS (Linux) to be able to function
index.md.Autrement dit, de base seule la fonction: In other words, basically only the SMTP function works, the others are reserved for experts who can, if they wish, configure these options themselves
index.md.L'onglet configuration SMTP permet de re: The SMTP configuration tab allows you to enter information about the email server you want to use
index.md.Voici quelques exemples pour les princip: Here are some examples for the main email service providers
index.md.Attention Google semble avoir changé sa: Attention Google seems to have changed its policy at the gmail level and it is no longer possible to use gmail with the plugin (even using an application key
index.md.Cela ne semble en revanche pas impacter: However, this does not seem to impact all Gmail accounts (without us having the rule of where it works or not and why)
index.md.Les champs \" Utilisateur SMTP \" et \": The "SMTP User" and "SMTP Password" fields correspond to the identifiers of your email account
index.md.A partir de l'onglet \"Commandes\", vous: From the "Orders" tab, you can add orders that correspond to the email addresses to which you wish to be able to send emails with Jeedom
index.md.l'adresse email à laquelle envoyer le me: the email address to send the message to
index.md.Vous pouvez en mettre plusieurs en les s: You can put several by separating them with
index.md.permet d'afficher la configuration a: used to display the advanced configuration of the command (historization method, widget, etc
index.md.Ce plugin fonctionne comme un module, c': This plugin works like a module, that is to say that once saved, it appears in the list of actions or commands
index.md.Il est ainsi très simple de l'utiliser l: It is thus very simple to use it when creating scenarios for example
index.md.Dans un scénario, une fois sélectionné d: In a scenario, once selected in an action, you will have to enter the title and the message
index.md.Si vous êtes en double authentification: If you are in double authentication with Gmail you must give a specific password for the application
index.md.Mon compte ⇒ connexion et sécurité ⇒ Se: My account ⇒ login and security ⇒ Log in to Google ⇒ Application passwords, if this is not the case you must enter your usual gmail password
index.md.Le format HTML est supporté par l'éditeu: HTML format is supported by the scenario editor for the body of messages
